title: The Package contains data from the Soil projects in Haiti
text: Anyone interested publishing data: World Bank flood extent data (mwater) attributed “Plan d’Élaboration propre basée sur les données de la Banque Mondiale: Inondation de Récurrence (5 ans / 25 ans / 100 ans)” Sanitation zoning assessment data (okap) attributed “data developed USAID Water Sanitation Project collaboration Cap-Haitian municipal government DINEPA. data reflect opinion USAID US Government.”

title: Location of different sanitation systems in Haiti — mwater
Location of different sanitation systems in Haiti — mwater
text: tibble 1849 rows 7 variables: latitude Lattitude coordinate longitude Longitude coordinate administra Communal section- smallest administrative unit Haiti type Type water access point date_added Date water access point added mWater datasets Dataset mWater point part , including organizaiton responsible data geometry Geospatial data different access points added mWater

title: Location of different sanitation systems in Haiti — mwater
text: Plan d’Élaboration propre basée sur les données de la Banque Mondiale: Inondation de Récurrence (5 ans / 25 ans / 100 ans)

title: Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
text: data includes data sanitation zoning report done city Cap Haitien, Haiti 2022. Additionally, contains spatial data neighborhoods 5 different Haitien cities.

title: Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
text: tibble 198 rows 21 variables: neighborho Unique identifying number neighborhood unit name Name nieghborhood unit sup_km2 Area neighborhood square km cte Name commune (administrative unit Haiti) economy Categorical socioeconomic status (low, medium) sup_bati_km2 area neihborhood covered buildings square kilometers density Categorical population density (least dense, somewhat dense, dense, dense, dense) aptitude suitability site wastewater treatment system zoning "group" collective grouped sanitation possible short term. latrine Suggested pit latrine septic allowance (allowed, allowed) density_ra Catgoriccal population density according description variable "density" (values 1 5) economy_nu Categotical socioeconomic status according description variable "economy" (1=low, 2 = medium) geometry Geospatial data neighborhood stored polygon

title: Sanitation zoning assessment data — okap
text: data developed USAID Water Sanitation Project collaboration Cap-Haitian municipal government DINEPA. data reflect opinion USAID US Government.
